title: Which subject is hard for 10th class? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have given my 10th boards last year, so I am perfect to answer this question!! SUBJECTS:English/Hindi - This subject is totally unpredictable, no matter how well you have written you will not be 100% sure about your marks. I was expecting my English marks to be 95+ but it was 88(I didn't went for rechecking because it's waste).Sanskrit- You can easily score 100/100 in Sanskrit if you work hard constantly. This subject can be a percentage booster for you.Maths- Some students say maths is tough whereas some say it's easy. For me, it was a subject of practice, the more you solve the more you learn. NCERT is must because 60% questions directly come from NCERT in boards, trust me!! I got 97 in maths just by solving NCERT, I didn't followed any book like R.S Agawal, R.D Sharma etc etc.Social Studies- This subject has the lengthiest syllabus, as you know. Evaluators check 1 marks questions seriously, rest questions just you should right to the point and you will get marks. Maps are very easy, so try to make no mistakes there.Science- You can easily score 90+ in science if you practice hard. Boards result depends on your practice in last 3 months i.e NOV-FEB. Practicing diagrams are very important with neat answers.Rest it depends on your hare work. If you will work really hard, then no subject will be hard for you. Signing off Best of Luck!! Swadhin Kishan
